name: SIVR - Space Invaders VR
description:
Why hello there, welcome to my new game, It's my entry to UGJ #30, and I had a lot of fun making it. 

The theme of the jam was 8 bit and I thought it would be cool to make a vr game, and settled on google cardboard as my platform and space invaders as my game. Unfortunately, I had no clue that there was an entire sdk for google cardboard, and ended up doing all the programming the hard way, although this did give me the opportunity to learn a lot from the project. This is what i ended up with, It has most of the features from the original arcade game, not all tho. there are 3 levels, each with increasing difficulty.  I was only really able to release for android, as the system needs a mobile device, and apple hates devs, but I have included the xcode project if you want to build and install the app yourself.

Definitely a fun project, hope you enjoy!
